original_text:
You will make them as a blazing oven
    when you appear.
The Lord will swallow them up in his wrath,
    and fire will consume them.
korean_text: 왕이 노하실 때에 그들을 풀무불 같게 할 것이라 여호와께서 진노하사 그들을 삼키시리니 불이 그들을 소멸하리로다

sentences.original_text: You will make them as a blazing oven
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들을 타오리는 화덕 같게 만들 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord will swallow them up in his wrath,
